item.description:
We're on a Scrabble roll! Another mid-month Scrabble meetup, this one just before Thanksgiving. Thanks to the great turnout, I'm asking folks just to contribute $1/month from now on. That means you only need to contribute once even if you come to two games in a month. If there is a surplus I'll buy snacks for folks!

Recent Meetups have lasted 2-3 hours, with some folks staying for two games, and some folks leaving after just one. Turnout has ranged from 6-18. Skill and experience has ranged too, from novice players to tournament players. One thing has stayed the same, and that's everyone's fun!

As always, a good resource for new players is the Cross Tables "cheat sheet"--a list of two letter and other highly playable words. Look it over if you like, but you don't need to to have fun playing.
item.name: Pre-Thanksgiving Scrabble Meetup!
